content.summary: Ufos that looked like stars with red,blue flashing

content.detailedDescription: it was almost dark and a friend and i were goingto the carting please when we ride near the football place that leays near aforest i saw something in the aer is was big a triangle with 3 (orange yellowred)all in one lights and it was buzzing bud for 5-10 min it stayed still andsudden it flew away with a fast speed but making no noice. since that time iamvery interested in information about ufo learning about them and every thing butnow i reported because i have seen the same object in the book het geheim boekufo and now iam sure of what i have seen.
content.summary: Report a ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped at a red light on howe lane, somerset, nj and happened to look upand see what appeared to be a bright silver disk moving across the sky ratherslowly and suddenly disappear.  shortly after the disk disappeared a plane (jet)came into view.  what i saw previously bore no resemblance to a plane from anyangle.  what struck me the most was how it was there and then poof, gone.  thedisk appeared to move slower than any planes that are normally in the area.  itwas too far and too bright to see any details.  i had polaroid sunglasses on atthe time.  i know this is rather vague but i thought if someone else reports asighting this would lend credibility to it.
content.summary: Disk sighted in somerset, nj
Saw a light that stayed stationary for 90 minutes
Fast, silent object at apparent low altitude.

content.detailedDescription: This excerpt is taken from a larger report which includes multiple sightingreports from different dates.  that evening she was in her room with the lights off when she saw a light comingtoward her window.  "it was moving very slowly, going smoothly, weaving ina andout around trees and things.  it came to the left of the window, then cameforward toward the house.  i grabbed the binoculars and it backed up.  i said tomyself, okay no binoculars, and it came forward again, coming closer.  i justcould not resist and picked up the binoculars again.  it shot away at a terrificrate of speed."the witness got out of bed and went to the bathroom about a half hour after thesighting, she then returned to her room.  "suddenly it was there again, comingtoward my open window.  there was no sound and the way it was moving, i gotreally scared.  i ran downstairs and mom went outdoors with me. when we gotoutside it started to change, the light started spreading out and it started tomake a funny sound.  it was like an old engine sound with something wrong withit.  it just didnt fit.  we could see the bottom and there were four lightswith a circle of red lights in the center.  the lights moved apart and becameoblong and two of the lights changed from white to blue."  as they watched thelights moved to form a circle of light.  the object flew toward the southwestand out of view.
content.summary: Shape changing lights seen in davison, michigan
Saw disk-shaped light

content.detailedDescription: I was on the side of my house looking at the skiy smoking a ciggarette. i saw itout of the corner of my eye at first. i thought it was an airplane because wehave an airport in this town, but the object fell in the opposite direction. ifelt totally calm and peaceful, intrigued during tthe event. it was a red sphereof light and it fell slowly from the sky behind some trees.
content.summary: A round red light falling slowly from the sky

content.detailedDescription: on september 25, 1970, in the town of jessup, pa.,i was returning home from a high school football game, when i sighted adisk-shaped, glowing, silver u.F.O. 1000 feet in length. turret, windows, ontop, three glowing spheres, central flat disk, underneath. after event, i wasvisited by the men-in-black.
content.summary: Silver,  disk-shaped  object.

content.detailedDescription: Pilot flying into soeul inchon airport. from an altitude of 37000 ft two smoketrails were seen at an elevation starting at about 40 deg up descending to about10 deg up before dissapating. the motion was a helical flight (corkscrew) andnot particularly fast. it looked like space junk reentering. the whole eventlasted about 10 mins. these photos were taken about 5 mins after firstsighting. the flight pattern looked like the flight of the shuttle srbs afterseparation. the times quoted are utc (gmt).I cannot find how to attach theimages!
content.summary: Helical smoke trail over s korea
content.locationName: Approx 150 nm south of Se, New Jersey

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting on our deck having breakfast at 11:40 a.M.  firstwe hear the sound of an airplane (which is not unusual) however, it seemes tojust cut off instead of fade.  we looked up in the sky and saw to the north westa round silvery like object very far away high in the sky.  we live by newarkand teterboro airports and are use to seeing airplanes of all shapes and sizes. however, this seemed to be round and silvery.  it appeared to me to flash redand blue.  my husband doesnt agree.  it just seemed to float in a southwesterly direction for a 10 minuted period of time until i couldnt see it anylonger.  we dont know what we saw.  we do know - it wasnt a plane.  i waswondering if anyone else saw it.
content.summary: Saw something in the sky
saw disc with colored windows at march air force
Bright white sphere moving strangely
Saw strange fire looking object shooting up into t

content.detailedDescription: i remember waking up at about 10:30 pm and goingoutside and walking up the hill/street where i live and seeing 3 crafts. twowere triangular in shape and were smaller than the larger circular/rounded one.The lager round one was split in half yet still whole and spun in two differentdirections. the 2 other triangular ones were most likely doing the same thing. ithen remember turning around and seeing my friend walking up the street in asort of trance. i attempted to talk to him but he did not respond. then i cantremember anything for about 3 hours. at about 1 in the morning i awake in my bedand i feel the need to get out of my room but i cant. i feel like there arealiens or something in my room and their making it hard for me to move. then isimply fall asleep and waking up the next morning feeling ok but i stillremembered the crafts i saw the night before.
content.summary: I saw 2 triangular shaped craft and 1 circular/rou
Very bright star

content.detailedDescription: I was out about 45 miles to sea in the atlantic. weather was calm and i waslooking foward to a day of fishing. at about 3:00 pm, a reflection off a metaliccylinder caught my eye. the cylinder was hovering about 1000 feet over thesuface and the direct spot that it was hovering over was about 1500 feet awayfrom my boat. during the encounter, which lasted only about 45 seconds, theobject disturbed my compass and my gps. the screen on my gps said can not locatesignal. small bait fish became excited and swam to the surface. the craftemitted no light but a pulsing, electrical sound came from the craft. the crafthad two section that counter rotated around each other. i left to go see if ihad a camera down below, and when i returned, the craft had flown away. the fishsubsided, the compass returned to its berings, and my gps picked up the signal.
content.summary: Small, cylindrical object seen hovering
Daylight-dusk video of an object in april of 2002

content.detailedDescription: At our house making coffee. saw a red thing, it turned blue and then i ran andgot the binoculars. we thought the chemical place had blown up. my mom was verycalm and so was i. it turned yellow, then white, then green. it spun clockwiseand sometimes hovered. the whole time staying next to the radio tower. it wasblinking and spinning. it had triagular windows that were green and flourescent.There were about 9 windows. we watched it for about 1 hour and a half. then westopped watching it cause our legs were falling asleep.
content.summary: Saucer-like disk with triagular windows that chang

content.detailedDescription: was returning from lunch around noon, clear skywith some higher clouds.  was looking up to monitor stack emmissions for workand noticed the object tracking south to north.  noticed unusual colors, nowings, tail or fusilage and moving very slowly.  it looked like a multifacetedprism surrounded by a bubble.  as i watched it moving north, it suddenly made a90 degree turn east without decelerating as if on an electrical grid.  objecttracked west approximately 30 seconds and stopped completely.  it hovered forabout 15 seconds and shot off in a southeasterly direction at an incredible rateof speed.  this led me to believe that this was not a manned craft.  also theflight dynamics were like nothing i had observed before given my militarybackground.
content.summary: Saw a metallic ball eminating multiple colors at d
Fiery object

content.detailedDescription: object appeared in the north and travelled southat even speed.Then reappeared in the north and travelled south a few degreesfurther west.This repeated many times, each time a few degrees more to thewest.Then pattern repeated west to east, each time a little more toward thesouth.Lasted several hours.
content.summary: Boomerang shape with blue lights

content.detailedDescription: From form imy residence is a mobile home in rural country setting 5 miles north oflaingsburg, mi.  area is a small plane practice area and far away from anapproaches to the capitol city airport at lansing, mi, 30+ miles south.  i letmy dog out of the back of the mobile home (facing east) and saw a bright light,brighter than a star, which moved out of the ne slowly toward me and then wentin a westerly direction.  i went through the mobile home and out the front door(facing west) to watch it pass out of sight in the west.  it went from horizonto horizon.  i then walked to the back door to let in the dog.  there was asimilar bright light coming out of the northeast, from the horizon and it alsomoved across the sky, but it passed to the southeast until it disappeared behindtrees.  there were small planes flying in the area, but these lights bore noresemblence whatsoever to the aircraft.  no sound, no running lights.  we watchstars and aircraft a great deal in this country area and are familiar withsatellites as well. these were much brighter than a satellite, more like a verybright planet.  they were a steady light, not flashing or flickering.
content.summary: Nocturnal lights seen in laingsburg, michigan

content.detailedDescription: 1) witness states that she was sitting in her sisters backyard2) i always look at planes-this one shone quite brightly3) i thought it was a jet.4) i watched it from horizon to horizon.  when it was right above me, icommented on it to my niece who was sitting next to me.  i kept watching untilit disappeared to the south.  i thought it was strange that i didnt see anywings.5) it was cigar shaped, very shiny.  it just glided along.  there was no enginenoise.  it went from north to south, horizon to horizon.Witness checked these object characteristics on form 1 - cast light, reflectlight, appear solid, have outline.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object seen in laingsburg, michigan
Missing time, no actual sighting
Saw 5-2 disks attached.Each had 5 different colors

content.detailedDescription: i was in maine taking photographs of a house i ambuying. i had the impression that there were objects flying above, but i did nothave my glasses on, and dont really know. i had 27 photographs developed. inone of the photos it shows an obect above the tree line. it appeared to havebeen loosing altitude. it was whitish in color and had red and whire lightsbelowalmost looks like an inflatable rubber raft, but in the air. a socond object ismuch higher up, leaving a contrail behind, but making a very sharp (u-turn) turnin the sky. i had the images enlarged several times over and the colors andshape can be clearly seen in the first. in the second the shape is not seen butthe contrail seems to envelope the craft/ufo (unlike a jet airplane). thereseems to be some sort of disturbance/trail behind the first object that lookslike its decending in altitude. i also have the negatives to the photographs.
content.summary: Photos taken of my new home in maine shows things

content.detailedDescription: i was outside of a meetting hall and it was stilllight out.Seen a white object like a star move then turn sideways then it wassilver then it faded out completly.
content.summary: Silver disk that faded away

content.detailedDescription: i was running to the corner store and happen tonotice above me out the windshield a very bright fast moving light. my reactionwas literally what the heck is that?!?  this light was the brightness of a closeaircraft landing light but was moving away to the sw at rapid speed. no soundwas appearant and through binoculars i could only see the bright white light noother lights were visible. the most likely explanation would be a meteor thathad no tail or trail as it followed a single course until hidden by thetreeline.
content.summary: Saw a fast moving bright light

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on a highway outside durant, oklahoma. my two friend and i noticedit simultaneously moving slowly above the left treeline as if it were hovering.We all thought it was a ufo almost immediatly. we were scared at first becauseit seemed to be on an interception course with us. then as it began to move awaywe became excited following it. it hovered, flew slowly at an angle over theforest and then flew quickly out over a field where it slowly dimmed its lightuntil we could no longer see it. then we saw two strobes of light illuminate theentire field that seemed to eminate from its previous location just above theground. i do not know where one of my friends is these days but i am certainthat the other would be willing to tell his version of the experience as well.Please, contact me if there were any similar reports around this time andlocation, or if i can provide you with more specifics that cannot be containedin this format.
content.summary: In the fall of 94 two friends and i saw a ufo.
